mapper.update: update t_project_temp set memberid = #{memberid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=BIGINT}, day = #{day,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, createdate = #{createdate,jdbcType=CHAR}, headpicpath = #{headpicpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detailpicpath = #{detailpicpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, memberid, name, type, remark, money, day, status, createdate, headpicpath, detailpicpath, contact,appid,appprivatekey,alipaypublickey,feedback from t_project_temp where id = #{id}
select id, memberid, name, type, remark, money, day, status, createdate, headpicpath, detailpicpath, contact from t_project_temp

select tpt.id, tpt.memberid,tm.realname as membername,tpt.name, tpt.type, tpt.remark, tpt.money, tpt.day, tpt.status, tpt.createdate,tpt.headpicpath, tpt.detailpicpath, tpt.contact,tpt.appid, tpt.appprivatekey,tpt.alipaypublickey from t_project_temp tpt join t_member tm on tpt.memberid=tm.id where status = 'CHECKING' limit #{start},#{size}
select count(id) from t_project_temp where status = 'CHECKING'
